title: Meanwhile, in Canada...
body:
The whole country is currently in an uproar. "Why?" You ask? Because Prime Minister Justin Trudeau accidentally bumped into someone with his elbow in the House of Commons during a vote. Oh, but it's not just anyone. You see, it was a *female* Member of Parliament (MP).

Here's a CBC link to the article, but I'm not sure if the video is available in the US. I'll grab a YouTube link if that's the case.

http://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/trudeau-conservative-whip-1.3588407

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qt6bgbxkp84

And there they go turning this into some feminist issue. Fucking christ, I'm embarrassed of our House right now.. fuck's sakes..
